channel.title: Forth on The Weekly Challenge - Perl & Raku
channel.description: Recent content in Forth on The Weekly Challenge - Perl & Raku

item.title: The Weekly Challenge - Guest Contributions
item.description: As you know, The Weekly Challenge, primarily focus on Perl and Raku. During the Week #018, we received solutions to “The Weekly Challenge - 018” by Orestis Zekai in Python. It was pleasant surprise to receive solutions in something other than Perl and Raku. Ever since regular team members also started contributing in other languages like Ada, APL, Awk, Basic, Bash, Bc, Befunge, BQN, Brainfuck, C, CESIL, Chef, COBOL, C Shell, C++, Clojure, Crystal, D, Dart, Elm, Erlang, Excel VBA, Fish, Forth, Fortran, Gembase, GNAT, Go, Haskell, Haxe, HTML, Idris, Janet, Java, JavaScript, Kotlin, Lisp, Lua, M4, Macro Processor, MMIX, Mumps, Myrddin, Nim, Nix, Node.
